name: BOJ (musician)
description: '''Bolaji Odojukan''' (born 22 April 1994), better known by his stage name '''BOJ''', is an English-Nigerian singer, songwriter and record producer. He is one-third of the musical group [[DRB LasGidi]] with [[Teezee|TeeZee]] and Fresh L, and is known as a pioneer of [[alt√©]].
